snippet.title: The Crust | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Crust: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465470/The_Crust/

The Crust beta will be available on Steam Next Fest from October 9 to October 17th of October!

A narrative-led lunar colony sim game where you build on and beneath the surface. Explore the lunar surface, and expand into interplanetary space.
The core of The Crust is a new fusion of game mechanics of assembly line automation and robotic logistics in three layers of gameplay - above ground, underground and global. 
You'll have to find a balance between survival and exploration while managing infrastructure, resources, and crew. 
An epic tale of both humanity’s hubris and ingenuity — you’re the CEO leading and taking care of a growing new colony.
